0.1.name: wordpress/google-maps-widget
0.1.description:
Check out the Google Maps Widget video or give us a shout @WebFactoryLtd.

General widget options

  • title
  • address

Thumbnail map options

  • map size - width & height
  • map type - road, satellite, map or hybrid
  • pin color
  • pin size
  • zoom level

Lightbox map options

  • map size - width & height
  • map type - road, satellite, map or hybrid
  • zoom level
  • skin
  • show/hide address bubble
  • show/hide map title
  • header text
  • footer text

If you need a Google Maps shortcode plugin you might be interested in purchasing our premium 5sec Google Maps plugin.
